ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Having problems with 39 charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: Various drolvargs, giants, spiders and chickens in Dreadlands.  I know for intelligent mobs you have to tell them to attack every time you charm them. In my
ygData.messageBody:
Various drolvargs, giants, spiders and chickens in Dreadlands. I know for
intelligent mobs you have to tell them to attack every time you charm them.
In my case they never even attacked the first time I charmed them.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:john@...]
Sent: Monday, November 06, 2000 10:47 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Having problems with 39 charm song


Which mobs were you trying to charm and in what zones?

---John

At 10:27 AM 11/6/00 -1000, you wrote:
>I can't figure out why I can't get this song to work. I charm the mob
(eyes
>glaze over message), give it /pet back off (get message from pet), target a
>mob, hit auto attack, then give /pet attack command (do not get a message
>from pet). When I follow these steps, the mob just sits there and does
>nothing. It helps by keeping the mob from attacking us, but I would
>obviously prefer if he attacked what I told him to. Need someone who has
>experience charming with the 39 charm song to tell me what you do to get
>your pet to attack. BTW I do not have this problem with the 27 charm song.
>
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>

>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
